page.title: 09RELIGIONS IN ST.NINIANS.
page.content: Through this page we state information about Churches and other religious facts.{St.Ninians Old Parish-}Church of Scotland:Members-1316,Sunday School_ 102 Opened:1751,Minister-Rev. J. Stirling.Charities-Christian Aid,Nat. Bible Soc. Minister visits hospital,schools etc. {St.Ninians {United Free.}Members-430,Sunday School-102,Opened-1935 Minister:Rev.R. Lindsay.{Holy Spirit Roman Catholic {Church}Members:1000 Sunday School:none Opened:1964 Minister:Rev. P.J. Rourke {Bible Baptist Church:}Opened :1984 {Stirling Islamic Centre:}Opened:1983 Schools_different religions are studied,children participate in worship:Local RC Secondary :Scripture Union group Infirmary_services in wards on Sunday.So,as you can see there are many religious works in the St.Ninians area.(S.CRIPPIN.)
